document.full_text: ban ki-moon formally asked members of the united nations on monday to support his candidacy for a second five-year term as u.n. secretary-general -- a goal he looks almost certain to achieve.
document.title: u.n. chief ban ki-moon says running for 2nd term
lines_and_colors: ban ki-moon formally asked members of the united nations on monday to support his candidacy for a second five-year term as u.n. secretary-general -- a goal he looks almost certain to achieve.
